name: UpdateTicketInfo
description:
Partially update ticket details in HubSpot CRM.

Use this tool to perform a partial update on a ticket identified by its `{ticketId}` or a unique property value specified by `idProperty` in HubSpot CRM. Read-only and non-existent properties will cause errors. Clear property values by passing an empty string.

parameters.name: ticket_id
parameters.description: The internal ID of the ticket to be updated. This is used to identify the specific ticket in HubSpot CRM.

parameters.name: ticket_update_properties
parameters.description: A JSON object with key-value pairs representing the properties to update on the ticket. Each key is a property name, and its value is the new value for that property. Clear a property by setting its value to an empty string.

properties.description: Key value pairs representing the properties of the object.

parameters.name: unique_property_name
parameters.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for the ticket object. Specify if not using the default ticket ID.

value_schema.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

parameters.name: idProperty
parameters.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

value_schema.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

properties.description: Key value pairs representing the properties of the object.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
